name: pro-map-renderer
description: Tool to visualise Prodeus levels in 2D
author: Sam Berry

scripts.start: tsc -p tsconfig.electron.json && tsc -p tsconfig.renderer.json && electron-forge start
scripts.package: tsc -p tsconfig.electron.json && tsc -p tsconfig.renderer.json && electron-forge package
scripts.make: tsc -p tsconfig.electron.json && tsc -p tsconfig.renderer.json && electron-forge make
